column75: Custom field ([CHART] Date of First Response)

column26:
This Epic aims to conduct thorough testing of the functionality and security features across the HSBC UK online banking portal to ensure a seamless and secure user experience.

Detailed Description:

# *Functional Testing of Core Features*: Execute comprehensive testing of essential features including account overview, funds transfer, bill payments, statement viewing, and other key functionalities to validate their correct behavior and performance.
# *Cross-Browser and Cross-Device Testing*: Verify the compatibility and responsiveness of the HSBC UK website across various browsers (Chrome, Firefox, Safari, etc.) and devices (desktop, tablet, mobile) to ensure consistent user experience across different platforms.
# *Security Testing and Vulnerability Assessment*: Conduct rigorous security testing to identify and mitigate potential vulnerabilities that may compromise user data or system integrity.
# *Accessibility Testing*: Ensure the HSBC UK website complies with accessibility standards (WCAG) to guarantee an inclusive user experience for individuals with disabilities, including testing with screen readers, keyboard navigation, and color contrast ratios.
# *Performance and Load Testing*: Assess the website's performance under various load conditions to ensure it can handle peak traffic without degradation in speed or functionality, identifying and addressing any performance bottlenecks.
# *Continuous Monitoring and Bug Fixing*: Implement mechanisms for continuous monitoring of the HSBC UK website post-launch, promptly addressing any reported bugs or issues to maintain optimal performance and reliability.

Exploratory testing of HSBC online banking [https://www.hsbc.co.uk/] main page.
Application used: Xray Exploratory App

Definition

*Explore* the main page
*Using* Chrome and different screen sizes
*To discover* problems with usability

column1: [Low-level positive] Logging into online banking - HSBC UK
column26:
* *Environment*: MacOS Ventura Version 13.6.3 (22G436) Safari Version 16.6 (18615.3.12.11.2)
* *Test objective*: verification of correct login to the portal [https://www.hsbc.co.uk|https://www.hsbc.co.uk] 
* *Precondition*: MacOS Ventura + Safari browser + user has an open account 
* *Priority*: 1
* *Exit/acceptance criteria*: The user has been successfully logged in to the portal

column1: [High-level negative] Logging into online banking using incorrect data - HSBC UK
column26:
* *Environment:* MacOS Ventura Version 13.6.3 (22G436) Safari Version 16.6 (18615.3.12.11.2)
* *Test objective:* Verification of inability to log in to the portal using incorrect username and password [HSBC UK |https://www.hsbc.co.uk]
* *Precondition:* MacOS Ventura + Safari browser + user has an open account 
* *Priority:* 1
* *Exit/acceptance criteria:* The user has not been logged into the portal
